activities.title: Canyonlands National Park
activities.description: Discover the deep canyons and mesas of this park.

activities.title: Mountain Biking
activities.description: Ride the famous slickrock trails of Moab.

activities.title: Jeep Tours
activities.description: Take an off-road tour of Moab's rugged terrain.

activities.title: Hiking
activities.description: Hike scenic trails with breathtaking views.

activities.title: Hot Air Balloon Ride
activities.description: Soar above the red rock landscape at sunrise.

activities.title: Stargazing
activities.description: Enjoy stunning night skies in Moab's dark desert.

activities.title: Visit Dead Horse Point State Park
activities.description: Take in panoramic views of the Colorado River.
